articles.title: First probable case of children's mystery liver disease detected in Asia - The Star Online
articles.description: Japan's Health Ministry found one probable case of the mysterious severe acute hepatitis affecting children in the United States, Britain and 10 other countries, raising concerns that the disease is spreading outside of Europe and the US.

articles.title: Oil prices slide on China fears; Twitter rises on Musk deal - Guardian Nigeria
articles.description: Oil prices tumbled Monday along with equities in Europe and Asia on worries over a worsening Covid-19 outbreak in China, while US stocks finished a volatile session higher as Elon Musk sealed a deal to acquire Twitter.

articles.title: Mother dies after fight with sons who have autism, depression - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): A mother of two died from head injuries following a fight with her sons who suffer from autism and major depression, a coroner's court heard.

articles.title: Apple Highlights Singapore's Chicken Rice Clash in Film Directed by David Gelb - Branding in Asia Magazine
articles.description: Apple's 5-minute short film, from the creator of Chef’s Table and director of Jiro Dreams of Sushi, David Gelb, features two Singapore food stalls competing over chicken rice, a popular dish at open-air food courts in Singapore's iconic hawker centers.
